name: OctoEverywhere's Bambu Connect Cloud Mode
description: Cloud Empower Your Bambu Lab 3D Printers With Free, Private, And Secure Remote Access, AI Print Failure Detection, Real-time Notifications, Live Streaming, and More!
short_desc: OctoEverywhere's Bambu Connect Cloud Mode enables the full power of OctoEverywhere for Bambu Lab 3D printers
author: QuinnDamerell

form_fields.label: Bambulab printer serial number
form_fields.hint: Find using the printer's display or use https://octoeverywhere.com/s/bambu-sn

form_fields.label: Bambulab printer IP
form_fields.hint: Find using the printer's display or use https://octoeverywhere.com/s/bambu-ip

form_fields.label: Bambulab account region
form_fields.hint: Optional, use if your Bambu account is in the China region type 'china'
